Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located In East Vancouver along the Adanac Bikeway

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Developed by Union Allied, 1308 Adanac is a unique, five storey light-industrial and office strata project that redefines the way you work. Designed to accommodate any industrial, office or mixed requirements, the project is built with state-of-the-art features and amenities featuring oversized windows, soaring ceiling height, and boasting stunning views of the North Shore mountains. 1308 Adanac totals 30,095 SF of adaptable, configurable workspaces presenting the opportunity for investors and businesses alike to customize workspace and to situate your business in the rapidly evolving Clark Drive neighbourhood, as well as, one of Vancouver’s busiest thoroughfares.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located In East Vancouver along the Adanac Bikeway

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: A unique opportunity to acquire a 1.52 acre site within minutes of the Downtown Core of Vancouver with the potential to build up to 198,000 square feet of flex industrial space. Located directly across from Strathcona Park, 1140-1150 Raymur Avenue is the premier site available in the vibrant Strathcona neighbourhood of Vancouver. The subject property is only blocks away from the New St. Paul’s Hospital that is projected to be complete in 2026 at an estimated cost of $1.9 billion and is in close proximity to Emily Carr University of Art + Design and the Great Northern Way Campus which is home to the Centre for Digital Media. This area is a strategic location for city-serving industries and has a well established arts and cultural centre.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The subject property is well located in the Cambie and Main industrial area of Vancouver.
The subject property is well located in the Cambie and Main industrial area of Vancouver.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Centrally located in the dynamic Mt. Pleasant area of Vancouver surrounded by Olympic Village, the Creative Campus in False Creek and the future St. Paul’s Hospital, this location has become the chosen destination for businesses seeking to take advantage of the many amenities the area has to offer. The Property is a mere five minutes to downtown Vancouver and is within easy walking distance to the Olympic Village, Main Street-Science World SkyTrain Stations and the futureGreat Northern Way–Emily Carr Station. There are numerous restaurants, coffee shops, and craft breweries in the area including Red Truck Brewing, Craft Beer Market, Brassneck Brewing, Railtown Café, Flying Pig, Nuba, Tractor, Starbucks, and Glory Juice to name just a few.Specifically, the Property is located on 2nd Avenue just east of Main Street.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Cambie and Main industrial area

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: OFISWERKS by FORMWERKS, located at 234 West 3rd Avenue, is a newly developed AAA office and flex strata project in the heart of Mount Pleasant.  Formwerks Boutique Properties brings a timeless architectural presence to this evolving neighbourhood with classic, clean lines and industrial design elements that honour the history of the neighbourhood. The thoughtful design considers the future of tomorrow’s workplace, providing open concept plans with abundant natural light, natural shading through the use of green walls, and lush landscaping throughout. A second floor terrace, and gorgeous rooftop patio allow colleagues to unwind and reconnect while enjoying the picturesque city and mountain views. Building highlights include: 4,757 SF rooftop patio, end of trip facilities, loading doors, elevator, ceiling heights that range from 12' - 20', and 70 parking stalls including ample EV charging stations.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to present the opportunity to acquire a centrallylocated freestanding building in Kitsilano. The property is located mid-block on West 3rd between Pine and Burrard Street in a very centraland desirable commercial hub. This offering is ideal for a business looking to acquire a facility in an area with development upside and strong growth potential.
